attributes.question: What are the examples for operating systems
attributes.answer: Microsoft Windows, Linux, Ubuntu, Mac OS

attributes.question: What are the common features of an operating system
attributes.answer: Memory management, File handling, Security management, Disk space management, Task management

attributes.question: What are the different types of file attributes
attributes.answer: System, Read only, Hidden, Archive

attributes.question: How to manage files in an Operating System
attributes.answer: By grouping them inside the folders.

attributes.question: What is the different between file and folder
attributes.answer: File is a single document, Folder can hold collection of files/documents.

attributes.question: What is the meaning of open-source software
attributes.answer: Open-source softwares are freely available to use and it's source (source code) is freely available for users.

attributes.question: What is the meaning of closed-source software
attributes.answer: Closed-sourced software which has an owner, without a permission it does not available freely.

attributes.question: What is the meaning of file compression
attributes.answer: Reduce the file size by using a file compression software.

attributes.question: What are the examples for file compression softwares
attributes.answer: WinZip, WinRAR, 7zip

attributes.question: What is the meaning of system restore
attributes.answer: System Restore is a feature in Microsoft Windows that allows the user to revert their computer's state to that of a previous point in time, which can be used to recover from system malfunctions or other problems.

attributes.question: What is the meaning of computer virus
attributes.answer: It is a specific computer program which makes harmful activities or malfunctioning in a computer.

attributes.question: What is anti-virus software/virus guard
attributes.answer: It is a software which created to protect computer from harmful programs.

attributes.question: What are the examples for ant-virus softwares
attributes.answer: Avast, Kaspersky, Avira, AVG, BitDefender, Norton

attributes.question: How to recognize virus infection in a computer
attributes.answer: Slow down computer, Unexpected computer restarting, Malfunctioning softwares, Unexpected hard disk filling, CPU over heating, System crashes

attributes.question: How to avoid from computer viruses
attributes.answer: Use proper anti-virus software and make sure to update it, Avoid from unsure pen drive or software installing, Avoid from clicking spam emails or spam links, Make sure to install legitimate softwares rather than installing pirate or cracked softwares, Make sure to backup your important data

attributes.question: What is word processing
attributes.answer: Creating documents or letters by using a word processing software

attributes.question: What is the meaning of word processor
attributes.answer: Word processor is a software which allows to create, edit, print documents.

attributes.question: What are the commonly use word processing softwares
attributes.answer: Microsoft Word, OpenOffice Writer, Google Docs, LibreOffice Writer

attributes.question: What are the features of word processing software
attributes.answer: Creating, editing, saving and printing documents, Copying, pasting, moving and deleting text within a document, Formatting text, such as font type, bolding, underlining or italicizing, Creating and editing tables, Inserting elements from other software, such as illustrations or photographs

attributes.question: What is the best way to create 100 letters with different names and addresses in an efficiently
attributes.answer: Creating a mail merge document and making copies from it.

attributes.question: What is the way of placing an image or a clip art behind the text without making interrupt
attributes.answer: Placing the image as watermark image.

attributes.question: What are the different types of letter cases in MS Word
attributes.answer: Lower case, Upper case, Sentence case, Toggle case

attributes.question: What are the different types of page orientations modes in MS Word
attributes.answer: Portrait, Landscape

attributes.question: How to style a document title in MS Word
attributes.answer: By creating it as WordArt.

attributes.question: How to create dummy text in word document
attributes.answer: By typing '=Rand()'

attributes.answer: Portrait, Landscape

attributes.question: How to style a document title in MS Word
attributes.answer: By creating it as WordArt.

attributes.question: How to create dummy text in word document
attributes.answer: By typing '=Rand()'

attributes.question: What is Microsoft Excel
attributes.answer: Microsoft Excel is said to be a spreadsheet application or an electronic worksheet that is helpful for storing, analyzing data, manipulating data, and organizing reports.

attributes.question: Provide the different types of data formats available in Excel
attributes.answer: Accounting, Date, Percentage, Number, and Text are the different data formats available in Excel.

attributes.question: Define Format Painter
attributes.answer: If you want to copy the format of a cell, text, image etc and apply on another text, the Format painter is used.

attributes.question: Define cells in Excel
attributes.answer: The place where we store the data is called a cell.

attributes.question: List out the charts available in MS Excel
attributes.answer: Pie, Bar, Scatter, Line are some of the available charts in MS Excel, which is useful to provide graphical representation of a report/analysis.

attributes.question: What is the function used to get the total of columns and rows in Excel
attributes.answer: To get the total of columns and rows in Excel, use the function 'SUM'.

attributes.question: What is the use of 'IF' function in Excel
attributes.answer: To verify whether the conditions are true or false, the function 'IF' is used in Excel.

attributes.question: Give the advantage of Look Up function in Excel
attributes.answer: To return a value for array, you can use the function Look Up.

attributes.question: Provide the shortcut for find and replace
attributes.answer: Ctrl+F is the shortcut key to open the find tab and Ctrl+H is the shortcut to open find and replace tab.

attributes.question: To perform auto-sum on the rows and columns, what is the shortcut
attributes.answer: ALT=' is the shortcut to perform auto-sum on the rows and columns.

attributes.question: Which power point view works best for adding slide transition
attributes.answer: Slide sorter view

attributes.question: Which option can be used to set custom timings for slides in a presentation
attributes.answer: Rehearsal

attributes.question: What PowerPoint feature will you use to apply motion effects to different objects of a slide
attributes.answer: Animation Scheme

attributes.question: What is the difference between Slide Design and Auto Content Wizard
attributes.answer: Slide Design does not provide sample content but Auto Content Wizard provides sample content too.

attributes.question: In which menu can you find features like Slide Design, Slide Layout etc.
attributes.answer: Format Menu

attributes.question: Which menu provides you options like Animation Scheme, custom Animation, Slide Transition
attributes.answer: Slide Show Menu

attributes.question: What is the short cut key to insert a new slide in current presentation
attributes.answer: Ctrl+M

attributes.question: What is the best way to create another copy of a slide
attributes.answer: From Insert Menu choose Duplicate Slide.

attributes.question: What happens if you edited an image inserted in PowerPoint
attributes.answer: The original file that was inserted is not changed.

attributes.question: In Microsoft PowerPoint, what are the two kinds of sound effects files that can be added to the presentation
attributes.answer: .wave file, .mid file

attributes.question: What is a motion path
attributes.answer: A method of moving items on a slide.

attributes.question: What is a slide-title master pair
attributes.answer: A slide master and title master for a specific design template.

attributes.question: What is the view that displays the slides on a presentation as miniature representations of the slides
attributes.answer: Slide sorter view

attributes.question: What is the PowerPoint view that displays only text
attributes.answer: Outline view

attributes.question: What is the shortcut key can be used to view slide show
attributes.answer: F5

attributes.question: What is a database
attributes.answer: A database is an organized collection of data, generally stored and accessed electronically from a computer system.

attributes.question: What is DBMS (Database Management System)
attributes.answer: A database management system (DBMS) is software for creating and managing databases.

attributes.question: What is primary key
attributes.answer: Primary key is a unique identifier of a table.

attributes.question: What is foreign key
attributes.answer: Foreign key is a primary key of another table which helps to make relationships between tables.

attributes.question: What is an entity
attributes.answer: An entity is something that exists separately from other things and has a clear identity.

attributes.question: What is an attribute
attributes.answer: An attribute is a characteristic of an entity.

attributes.question: What are the three basic relationship types use in DBMS
attributes.answer: one-to-one, one-to-many, many-to-many

attributes.question: What is ERD (Entity Relationship Diagram)
attributes.answer: Diagram for use in database design.

attributes.question: What is SQL stands for
attributes.answer: Structured Query Language

attributes.question: What are the examples for DBMS
attributes.answer: Microsoft Access, Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle

attributes.question: What is HTML stands for
attributes.answer: Hyper Text Markup Language.

attributes.question: What is static web page
attributes.answer: A static Web page is a page that is built using HTML.

attributes.question: What is dynamic web page
attributes.answer: A dynamic web page is a web page that displays different content each time it's viewed.

attributes.question: What are languages use to create dynamic web pages
attributes.answer: JavaScript, DHTML, VBScript

attributes.question: What is W3C stands for
attributes.answer: World Wide Web Consortium.

attributes.question: How the W3C relate with the WWW (World Wide Web)
attributes.answer: The World Wide Web Consortium is the main international standards organization for the World Wide Web.

attributes.question: What is CSS stands for
attributes.answer: Cascading Style Sheets.

attributes.question: What is hyperlink
attributes.answer: A link from a hypertext document to another location.

attributes.question: What is the rendering tool/software of HTML
attributes.answer: Web browser/ Web Client

attributes.question: What is a cookie in website
attributes.answer: A small text file created by a website that is stored in the user's data.

attributes.question: What is a website
attributes.answer: A website is a collection of publicly accessible, interlinked Web pages.

attributes.question: What is an attachment
attributes.answer: An attachment, or email attachment, is a file sent with an email message.

attributes.question: What are the Cc and Bcc in email
attributes.answer: Cc - Carbon Copy, Bcc - Blind Carbon Copy

attributes.question: How the Cc and Bcc differentiate?
attributes.answer: The difference between Cc and Bcc is that carbon copy (CC) recipients are visible to all other recipients whereas those who are BCCed are not visible to anyone.

attributes.question: What is search engine
attributes.answer: A web search engine is a web application that is designed to search for information on the World Wide Web.

attributes.question: What are the components of a computer system
attributes.answer: Hardware, Software, Liveware, Firmware

attributes.question: What are the components of CPU
attributes.answer: ALU (Arithmetic logic unit), CU (Control unit), Registers

attributes.question: What is FSB (Front Side Bus)
attributes.answer: The Front Side Bus connects the CPU to main memory.

attributes.question: What is BSB (Back Side Bus)
attributes.answer: It connects the CPU to a Level 2 cache.

attributes.question: What are the three types of cashe memories
attributes.answer: Level 1, Level 2, Level 3

attributes.question: What is primary memory in computer
attributes.answer: RAM (Main Memory), ROM

attributes.question: What is a volatile memory
attributes.answer: RAM (Random Access Memory)

attributes.question: What is a non-volatile memory
attributes.answer: ROM (Read Only Memory)

attributes.question: What is the different between volatile and non-volatile
attributes.answer: Volatile Memory is a type of memory in which data contained in the memory is lost whenever the power is turned off. Non-volatile memory as once the user turns off your computer then content remains intact and will not get lost.

attributes.question: What is secondary memory in computer
attributes.answer: Hard disk, Optical drives (CD/DVD-ROM), Flash drives (Pen drive)

attributes.question: What is the port which supports multiple devices
attributes.answer: USB port

attributes.question: What is hot-swappable
attributes.answer: Hot-swappable means that you can plug in or remove a device without first shutting down your computer.

attributes.question: What is plug and play
attributes.answer: Computer will recognize it as soon as it is installed.

attributes.question: What are the four classifications of computers
attributes.answer: Supercomputer, Mainframe Computer, Minicomputer, Microcomputer

attributes.question: What are the types of operating systems
attributes.answer: Real time OS, Single user-single task OS, Single user-multi task OS, Multi user-multi task OS

attributes.question: What is BIOS (Basic Input/Output System)
attributes.answer: The built-in program which controls the primary functions of a computer.

attributes.question: What is computer a network
attributes.answer: A computer network is a set of computers connected together for the purpose of sharing resources.

attributes.question: What is network topology
attributes.answer: Network topology refers to the physical or logical layout of a network.

attributes.question: What are the basic network topologies
attributes.answer: Bus, Star, Ring, Mesh

attributes.question: What is the hybrid topology
attributes.answer: Hybrid topology is an interconnection of two or more basic network topologies.

attributes.question: What is the example for Hybrid topology
attributes.answer: Tree topology

attributes.question: What are the basic data transmission/communication modes
attributes.answer: Simplex, Half-duplex, Full-duplex

attributes.question: What are the data transmission/communication modes among network devices
attributes.answer: Unicast, Multicast, Broadcast

attributes.question: What are the two types of network architectures
attributes.answer: Client-server architecture, Peer-to-peer architecture

attributes.question: What is protocol
attributes.answer: A protocol is a set of rules that governs the communications between computers on a network.

attributes.question: What is IP stands for
attributes.answer: Internet Protocol

attributes.question: What is the use of IP address
attributes.answer: An IP address, or simply an "IP," is a unique address that identifies a device on the Internet or a local network.

attributes.question: What is the different between IP address and MAC (Media Access Control) address
attributes.answer: IP address is a logical address which can be changed. MAC address is a physical address which cannot be changed.

attributes.question: What are the different types of network
attributes.answer: PAN(Personal Area Network), LAN (Local Area Network), MAN(Metropolitan Area Network), WAN(Wide Area Network)

attributes.question: What are the basic protocols govern the network / internet
attributes.answer: TCP (Transmission Control Protocol), IP (Internet Protocol)

attributes.question: What is bandwidth
attributes.answer: Maximum data transfer rate of a network or Internet connection.

attributes.question: What are the unguided/unbound media
attributes.answer: Radio wave, Micro wave, Infrared

attributes.question: What are the guided/bound media
attributes.answer: Coaxial, Twisted-Pair, Fiber optics

attributes.question: What are the three basic requirements for data communication
attributes.answer: Sender, Medium, Receiver

attributes.question: What are the two types of conceptual models use in networking
attributes.answer: OSI (Open System Interconnection) model, TCP/IP model

attributes.question: Which are the layers of OSI model can be directly interacted with user
attributes.answer: Application Layer (Layer 7)  User Interfaces, Physical Layer (Layer 1)  Network cables and hubs

attributes.question: What is domain name
attributes.answer: A domain name is simply a human readable form of an IP address.

attributes.question: What is the use of DNS (Domain Name System)
attributes.answer: Domain name to IP mapping is done by DNS

attributes.question: What is the use of DHCP (Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol)
attributes.answer: DHCP is a protocol for assigning dynamic IP addresses to devices on a network.

attributes.question: What are the two types of IP addresses
attributes.answer: Static IP (Permanent IP), Dynamic IP (Temporary IP)

attributes.question: What is the use of 'ipconfig' command in Windows
attributes.answer: ipconfig' allows you to get the IP address information of a Windows computer.

attributes.question: What is the use of 'ping' command
attributes.answer: ping' allows a user to verify that a particular IP address exists and can accept requests.

attributes.name: Develop Graphics for Online / Print Media

attributes.question: What is a pixel
attributes.answer: Smallest unit of the digital image/display.

attributes.question: What is pixel resolution
attributes.answer: Total number of pixels of a digital image/display.

attributes.question: How to measure resolution
attributes.answer: Pixel per inch (ppi)

attributes.question: What is vector graphics
attributes.answer: Points and paths based graphics.

attributes.question: What is raster graphic
attributes.answer: Pixel based graphics.

attributes.question: What are the primary/additive colors
attributes.answer: Red, Green, Blue

attributes.question: What are the secondary/subtractive/four/process colors
attributes.answer: Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, Black

attributes.question: What is the application of primary colors
attributes.answer: Digital displays / images.

attributes.question: What is the application of secondary colors
attributes.answer: Printing purposes.

attributes.question: What are the suitable image file types for web
attributes.answer: jpeg, png, gif

attributes.question: What are the popular vector graphic softwares
attributes.answer: Adobe Illustrator, Corel Draw

attributes.question: What are the popular raster graphic softwares
attributes.answer: Adobe Photoshop, GIMP

attributes.question: What is the relationship between HTML and CSS
attributes.answer: CSS is used to style the HTML pages.

attributes.question: Which tag is used to create hyperlink
attributes.answer: Anchor tag ('a' tag)

attributes.question: What is the meaning of empty tag
attributes.answer: Empty tags does not contain attributes inside the tag.

attributes.question: What is the meaning of self-closing tag
attributes.answer: Self-closing tag does not include closing tag.

attributes.question: What is the current version of HTML
attributes.answer: Version 5

attributes.question: What is the current version of CSS
attributes.answer: Version 3

attributes.question: What is the meaning of CSS framework
attributes.answer: It is a complete package which helps to decorate HTML pages easily.

attributes.question: What are the examples for CSS frameworks
attributes.answer: Bootstrap, Foundation, Skeleton, Tailwind

attributes.question: What are the tags that can be used to design the layout of a web page
attributes.answer: div' Tag, 'table' Tag

attributes.question: Who is the responsible person for manage a website in an organization
attributes.answer: Web Administrator

attributes.question: What is the advantage of dynamic web page
attributes.answer: Dynamic web pages can generate different content according to the situation, user or session.

attributes.question: What are the three types of including CSS to a web page
attributes.answer: Inline, Internal, External

attributes.question: What is the tag that can be used to create HTML animations
attributes.answer: marquee' tag

attributes.question: What are the examples for web programming languages
attributes.answer: PHP, ASP.NET, JSP, JavaScript

attributes.question: What are the requirements for publish a website
attributes.answer: Hosting service, Domain name

attributes.question: What is the importance of a domain name
attributes.answer: Domain name can be used as an unique identifier for a particular website.

attributes.question: When you upload your website to a hosting server, how to define your home page
attributes.answer: The home page should be rename as 'index.html'

attributes.question: What are the stages/phases of SDLS (System Development Life Cycle)
attributes.answer: Planning, Analysis, Design, Implementation, Testing, Maintenance

attributes.question: What are facts finding methods using in analysis phase
attributes.answer: Sampling of existing documentation, Research and Site visits, Observation of the work environment, Questionnaires, Interviews, Prototyping, Joint requirements planning

attributes.question: What is the output of analysis phase in SDLC
attributes.answer: SRS (Software Requirements Specification) Document.

attributes.question: What are the main two types of designing
attributes.answer: Logical design, Physical design

attributes.question: What is the different between logical and physical design
attributes.answer: Logical design represent the data flow of the system, physical design represent the data storing (database) of the system.

attributes.question: What is DFD stands for
attributes.answer: Data Flow Diagram.

attributes.question: What is the using of DFD
attributes.answer: To represent the data flow of the system.

attributes.question: What are the two types of programming approaches
attributes.answer: Functional programming, Object oriented programming (OOP)

attributes.question: What are the three types of control structures/control construct
attributes.answer: Sequential, Selection/Conditional, Looping/Iteration/Repeating

attributes.question: What are the commonly use programming languages
attributes.answer: Java, Python, PHP, JavaScript, Visual Basic, C#

attributes.question: What is the different between compiler and interpreter
attributes.answer: Compiler converts the whole program in one goes on the other hand. Interpreter converts the program by taking a single line at a time.

attributes.question: What is the different between high level languages and low level languages
attributes.answer: Low level language is machine readable form of program. High level language will be in human readable form.

attributes.question: What are the examples for high level programming languages
attributes.answer: Java, Python, PHP, JavaScript, Visual Basic, C#

attributes.question: What are the examples for low level programming languages
attributes.answer: Machine code, Assembly language

attributes.question: What is the term called "bug" in programming
attributes.answer: A software bug is an error, flaw, failure or fault in a computer program.

attributes.question: What is the meaning of debug
attributes.answer: The process of identifying and removing errors from computer hardware or software.

attributes.question: What is the meaning of "Source code"
attributes.answer: Source code is the set of instructions and statements written by a programmer using a computer programming language.

attributes.question: What are the main types of software testing methods
attributes.answer: Black box testing, White box testing, Gray box testing

attributes.question: What is the meaning of unit testing
attributes.answer: Testing the smallest part of individual unit / component of the system.

attributes.question: What is the meaning of integration testing
attributes.answer: Program units are combined and testing as groups.

attributes.question: What is the meaning of system testing
attributes.answer: System testing is done after integration testing, testing the system as a whole.

attributes.question: What is the meaning of acceptance testing
attributes.answer: Last phase of the software testing process. A system is tested for acceptability.
